post.title: panasonic vt30 3d
post.content: need some help have panny 65vt30 and a ps3. have the ps3 connected directly to the tv via hdmi 1.4. it detects the tv and 3d via the display settings on the ps3 yet no 3d when i play uncharted. i've only had the tv for bout 8hrs now and was wondering if i can get some help feedback
